name: Flight Training College George CC
about: Flight Training College (FTC) in George, South Africa, offers a comprehensive range of pilot training programs, from the basic Private Pilot Licence (PPL) to the advanced Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL) and Airline Transport Pilot Licence (ATP). Our primary focus is on Professional Pilot Training, while also enhancing knowledge, skill, and safety standards in the recreational and private flying sectors. Located at George Airport, one of the most ideal locations in the Cape flying region and equipped to international standards, FTC is committed to delivering the best training possible. We prepare our graduates for careers in the aviation industry, whether they aim to fly privately or commercially. Our courses include Instrument Rating, Multi Engine, and Instructor Rating, ensuring our students are well-prepared for their aviation careers. With a strong emphasis on career guidance and support, FTC is the ideal place to start your aviation journey.
